content: this amigurumi pattern is an adorable fluffy orangutan you make the head body arms and legs in grey first then add the muzzle ears and eye sockets in beige before surface crocheting with finger eyelash yarn to add his fuzzy fur you can optionally add wire in the arms and legs and magnets in the hands and feet if you want to make him posable you should need less than one ball each of grey beige and ginger made with 2mm 2 5mm and 3mm hooks
